name: High on Fire
description: '''High on Fire''' is an American [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band from [[Oakland, California]], that was formed in 1998. [[Matt Pike]], the band's frontman and founder, also plays guitar for [[Sleep (band)|Sleep]]. High on Fire won the 2019 [[Grammy Award]] for [[Best Metal Performance]] with their song "Electric Messiah". The band has released nine studio albums, with their newest, ''[[Cometh the Storm]]'', released in 2024.
